eas_text: A civil authority has issued A LAW ENFORCEMENT WARNING for the following counties or areas: Columbia, FL; at 03:43 PM ON JAN 3, 2026 Effective until 07:43 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
The Following is a Shelter In Place notice from the Columbia County Sheriff's Office.

Please be on the lookout for a 19 year old black male, wearing short shorts, a cut-off shirt over another shirt. He is believed to be armed with a 9 mm weapon with an extended magazine. He is not wearing shoes. If you have any information on this individual please contact the Sheriff's Office Dispatch Center at (386) 719-2005.

At this time please Shelter in Place if you are receiving this message.
